column4: hi. i'm using ubuntu 9.04 on x64. i have 4 GB Ram/800 MHz and a AMD x2 Dual core. My firefox is veeeeerrryyy slowwwwwwwww !? :|
install graphics drivers
it's installed already. i have normal visual effects
how is it slow? in what way? like opening? closing? browsing? creating new tabs?
when i run pages which contains Flash. I have 3 addons : AdBlock Plus, Firebug and Web Developer.
interesting
yes .. i really love the terminal but this problem makes me angry. i'm web developer  ... i can't use a "slow firefox"
I have like 20 addons on mine and it's fine... what type of flash plugin do you have? one by Adobe or one of the OpenSource variety?
try removing adblock and see if that improves performance.  Just start removing them to see which one is causing the slowdown
how did it run before you added your dev tools?
done. seems the same. i think there's a bug in Adobe Flash or something like that.
sehr interessant (very interesting in German).  Has your kernel updated recently?
yes, i have the last. Linux 0x 2.6.28-15-generic
I've had to reinstall all of my graphics after every kernel upgrade
mine was default installed :-)
what kind of card do you have?
i have the same problem ( slow firefox with flash bug ) on a laptop with intel x3100. ( the compiz was ok )
*shrugs* idk sorry dude(or dudette)
trotzdem danke
bitte
my last bit of thought... uninstall and reinstall flash
